parts.name: statement
parts.prose: Generate a unique session identifier for each session with {{ sc-23.3_prm_1 }} and recognize only session identifiers that are system-generated.

parts.name: guidance
parts.prose: Generating unique session identifiers curtails the ability of adversaries to reuse previously valid session IDs. Employing the concept of randomness in the generation of unique session identifiers protects against brute-force attacks to determine future session identifiers.
